Nestled in the vibrant Kilimani district of Nairobi, these apartments redefine urban living with a seamless blend of modern sophistication and comfort.

We present a once in a lifetime opportunity. It is remarkably rare that a prestigious scheme on such a grand scale is created at the heart of the capital. Moments away from the Nairobi Central Business District with the stunning views of the city skyline. This is coupled with spacious interior spaces, an expansive roof terrace, a swimming pool, children play area, lobby, gym and sauna. We give you all the reasons to make this your investment or residence property. Designed and finished to the highest standards inside and out, this is an opportunity to come home to the ultimate address in the most exciting city in East and Central Africa. View more
